wikipedia_page.main: Lindsay Redvers Mark Seymour Croisdale-Appleby  (born 12 May 1973) is a British diplomat and Head of the UK Mission to the European Union. Appointed in January 2021, he formally presented his credentials to the President of the European Commission on 29 July 2021. He was Ambassador to Colombia from 2012 to 2015.

response: British diplomat Lindsay Croisdale-Appleby , ambassador to the European Union and former ambassador to Colombia, was educated at Eton College and St. Hugh's.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Colombia
Principal Private Secretary to the Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs

response: He joined the Diplomatic Service in 1973 and was posted to Caracas 1975–78 with the rank of Third Secretary, later Second Secretary. From 1979 to 1983 he worked at the Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO), then was posted as First Secretary to the UK delegation to the OECD in Paris 1983–87. At the FCO again he was Deputy Head of (successively) the Republic of Ireland, Falkland Islands and Resource Management Departments 1987–92. He was then Deputy Head of Mission in Dublin 1992–96 and in Madrid 1996–99. After returning to the FCO as Head of the Latin America and Caribbean Department 2000–03, he was seconded to Lehman Brothers in London 2003–04 as Senior Policy Adviser before being appointed HMA, Havana in May 2004, formally presenting his letters of credence that NovemberExcelencias Turisticas - Cuba,  Issue No. 4). Dew's pre-retirement posting was as HMA, Bogota, from 2008 until 2012, when he was succeeded by Lindsay Croisdale-ApplebyHer Majesty's Ambassador, Lindsay Croisdale-Appleby FCO press release, 2 May 2008 on leaving the FCO.
After the UK left the EU on 31 January 2020, Barrow's portfolio changed to British Ambassador to the European Union effective 1 February, being succeeded in 2021 by Lindsay Croisdale-Appleby.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to the European Union
response: *2021–: Lindsay Croisdale-Appleby (technically not yet installed as ambassador because of a diplomatic row between the EU and the UK)
